title: Can't find Emote (screenshots)
body:
I purchased an Emote and it is showing up nowhere in my collection. It's not in my emotes tab, even though it clearly shows up in my purchase history. I bought the TSM one before, is there any way I can get this one to work?

https://gyazo.com/2b31961a794141a973038217612ba500
https://gyazo.com/923c39d5a6df27f2aadc51fdf32e4e19

replies.body: Hey there, restart your client as this could just be a syncing issue.  If it's still not showing up, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can investigate further and see what happened.  Sorry about that!
